Royal Privilege.name: Royal Privilege
Royal Privilege.description: Innate: Qiyana's next basic attack or damaging ability deals 15 − 83 (based on level) (+ 55% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP)  bonus physical damage to all enemies hit.
Royal Privilege.description2: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Royal Privilege.description3: Royal Privilege's cooldown is  reset on all targets upon gathering or changing an  Element.

Edge of Ixtal.name: Edge of Ixtal
Edge of Ixtal.description: Active: Qiyana slashes forward in a line, dealing physical damage, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first.
Edge of Ixtal.leveling:
Physical Damage:
60 / 85 / 110 / 135 / 160 (+ 90% bonus AD)
Reduced Damage:
45 / 63.75 / 82.5 / 101.25 / 120 (+ 67.5% bonus AD)
Edge of Ixtal.description2: Upon gathering an  Element, Edge of Ixtal is upgraded to Elemental Wrath and its cooldown is  reset.

Elemental Wrath.name: Elemental Wrath
Elemental Wrath.description: Active: Qiyana consumes her current Element and  hurls her blade, detonating in a line upon colliding with an enemy or reaching maximum range, and applying a bonus effect based on the consumed Element.
Elemental Wrath.description2: Enemies are dealt physical damage, reduced to 75% damage against subsequent units beyond the closest.
Elemental Wrath.leveling2:
Physical Damage:
60 / 85 / 110 / 135 / 160 (+ 90% bonus AD)
Reduced Damage:
45 / 63.75 / 82.5 / 101.25 / 120 (+ 67.5% bonus AD)
Elemental Wrath.description3: Brush: The blade raises a grass trail behind for 3.5 seconds, granting Qiyana  invisibility and  20% bonus movement speed until she attacks or exits.
Elemental Wrath.description4: River:  Roots for 0.5 seconds, then  slows by 20% for 1 second.
Elemental Wrath.description5: Terrain: Enemies below 50% of maximum health are dealt bonus damage.
Elemental Wrath.leveling5:
Bonus Damage:
36 / 51 / 66 / 81 / 96 (+ 54% bonus AD)
Total Damage:
96 / 136 / 176 / 216 / 256 (+ 144% bonus AD)
Total Damage to targets beyond the first:
81 / 114.75 / 148.5 / 182.25 / 216 (+ 121.5% bonus AD)

Terrashape.name: Terrashape
Terrashape.description: Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains  bonus attack speed,  25 bonus range, her basic attacks and basic abilities deal  bonus magic damage, and she gains out-of-combat  bonus movement speed while moving near the Element currently being held.
Terrashape.leveling:
Bonus Attack Speed:
5 / 10 / 15 / 20 / 25%

Bonus Magic Damage:
8 / 16 / 24 / 32 / 40 (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP)

Bonus Movement Speed:
5 / 6.25 / 7.5 / 8.75 / 10%
Terrashape.description2: Active: Qiyana  dashes towards a target location, gathering an Element of the nearest  Brush,  River or  Terrain she targeted.
Terrashape.description3: A target Element is required to cast this ability.
Terrashape.notes: * Terrain created by champions are not valid target terrain.

Audacity.name: Audacity
Audacity.description: Active: Qiyana  dashes a fixed distance towards the target unit, dealing physical damage.
Audacity.description2: Casting  Edge of Ixtal during Audacity will aim at the dash target.
Audacity.notes: * Audacity only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.

Supreme Display of Talent.name: Supreme Display of Talent
Supreme Display of Talent.description: Active: Qiyana sends a windblast in the target direction that  knocks back enemies. The windblast stops upon hitting terrain.
Supreme Display of Talent.description2: The windblast then creates a shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage, with the percentage damage capped against monsters, and  stunning enemies for 1 − 0.5 (based on proximity) seconds.
Supreme Display of Talent.leveling2:
Physical Damage:
100 / 135 / 170 / 205 / 240 (+ 170% bonus AD) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)
Capped percentage damage:
500 / 625 / 750 / 875 / 1000
Supreme Display of Talent.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
 Artificial terrain (e.g,  Anivia's  Crystallize,  Taliyah's  Weaver's Wall,  Trundle's  Pillar of Ice) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain.
